item.title: Dragon Ball: Gekishin Squadra adds PS5, PS4, and Switch versions; network test set for June 12 to 16
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/dragon-ball-gekishin-squadra-adds-ps5-ps4-and-switch-versions-network-test-set-for-june-12-to-16

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Smartphone
  • Switch

Formerly Dragon Ball Project: Multi.

Free-to-play team-based battle game Dragon Ball: Gekishin Squadra, formerly Dragon Ball Project: Multi, will be available for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch alongside its previously announced PC (Steam), iOS, and Android versions, publisher Bandai Namco and developer Ganbarion announced. An open network test will run across all platforms from June 11 at 11:00 p.m. PT / June 12 at 2:00 a.m. ET to June 15 at 10:59 p.m. PT / June 16 at 1:59 a.m. ET.

Here is an overview of the game, via Bandai Namco:

About

The Dragon Ball franchise’s first team-oriented battle begins!

Intense Four-Versus-Four Team Battle

Enter the world of Dragon Ball by bringing your favorite characters’ earth-shaking strength to the battlefield, and join up with your friends and allies to defeat your opponents and dominate the objectives.

Grow your strength throughout each round, unlock game-changing attacks and abilities, and obliterate enemy players and bosses alike.

Heroes With Roles

Pick heroes with unique abilities and skills to fulfill strategic roles for your team:

  • Damage – Simple but effective, super aggressive play style with a focus to take down the enemy
  • Tank – Persistent and hard to K.O., help your team hold the field and soak up the enemy’s attacks
  • Technical – Versatile support, maximize your team’s chances by boosting your allies and disrupting the enemy

Customization

Personalize your favorite heroes in your own style with character skins, entrance animations, and special finisher animations.

Find an aesthetic combination that shows off your love for the characters in your own way.

item.title: Free-to-play oceanic adventure RPG Sea of Remnants announced for PS5, PC, iOS, and Android
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/free-to-play-oceanic-adventure-rpg-sea-of-remnants-announced-for-ps5-pc-ios-and-android

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Smartphone

Due out in 2026 from Identity V developer Joker Studio.

Publisher NetEase Games and Identity V developer Joker Studio have announced Sea of Remnants, a free-to-play oceanic adventure RPG coming to PlayStation 5, PC via Steam, iOS, and Android in 2026.

“Sea of Remnants places the world’s fate directly in the players’ hands,” said Joker Studio product lead Sylar Pan in a press release. “With more than 300 characters to interact with—whether as allies, enemies, or something in between—every action can trigger surprising and far-reaching consequences. We’re excited to see the stories players will create when they finally set sail.”

Here is an overview of the game, via NetEase Games:

About

Sea of Remnants invites players into a visually captivating world, where they assume the role of a puppet-like sailor who has lost all their memories. Alongside a mysterious girl, players will voyage across vast seas, uncharted islands and a city slowly awakening to its secrets. Through open-world exploration, intense naval combat and dynamic interactions with a cast of over 300 eccentric characters, players will uncover the truth behind their forgotten identity and shape the fate of the world around them.

On this sprawling journey, players can recruit a crew of unique puppetfolk allies, customize their ships with modular upgrades, and build specialized teams for exploration and turn-based battles. Every decision—whether sparing enemies or seizing opportunities—will unleash dramatic ripple effects across the world. With rival factions reacting to each choice and Orbtopia’s cityscape evolving in response, no two captains will share the same story.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Key Features

  • Divergent Factions Thousand-Faced Puppets – A wide range of factions rooted in various social classes and cultural backgrounds introduces a cast of eccentric and uniquely styled characters. Each puppet is vividly designed with strong visual identity and expressive personality traits, making every interaction memorable and immersive.
  • City-State in Flux – The Rise and Fall of Power- In the ancient main city of Orbtopia, players take on the role of a citizen shaping the fate of their homeland. Through free exploration and dynamic interactions with NPCs, players influence key decisions that drive the rise or decline of the city-state. Every choice accelerates political shifts, redistributes influence among rival factions, and rewrites the balance of power.
  • A Lush and Romantic Ocean of Wonders – A rich, living seascape filled with natural wonders: players can explore ships from rival factions, diverse marine creatures, and a wide variety of islands, each with its own unique biome and atmosphere. Paired with a realistic ocean buoyancy system, marine life behavior, and dynamic weather, the game offers an immersive and believable sailing experience. Players will face the unknown—mysteries, dangers, and awe-inspiring encounters—unfolding a poetic and thrilling ocean voyage.
  • Shape or Shatter: A Thousand Cities, A Thousand Fates – Around 300 main-city NPCs each follow unique behavior patterns. Players can befriend, provoke, or even eliminate them—leading to highly open-ended outcomes. Through meaningful interactions and branching choices, players can alter their relationships with NPCs, driving dynamic storylines and even shifting the fate of the entire city of Orbtopia. With such depth and variability, 1,000 players may each experience 1,000 different versions of the same city.
  • Fast Paced and Immersive, Real-Time Naval Combat – Players can instantly engage hostile ships or strike first against lurking sea monsters. Dynamic, real-time encounters unfold at sea—whether facing enemy fleets or light-sensitive deep-sea threats, every second counts in these high-stakes showdowns.
  • Harbor of Joy, Endless Ways to Unwind – Enjoy a variety of relaxing side activities including fishing, hotpot cooking, and mahjong. Dive into a vibrant, immersive world where every corner of port life is packed with engaging and flavorful entertainment.
